title: simhAsana sthitE sundara
sahitya:
(rAga: saurASTra)   
 sihmAsanasthitE sundara guruguha nuta lalitE cidAnandanAthOham vandEham vandEham
			(rAga: vasanta)


anupallavi

 brahmAdi sakala dEvatArAdhita padayugaLE parashurAma parama bhAgavata pramukhOpAsita bagaLE
			(rAga: suraTi)


caraNam 1   kamalEshanuta mangalE kavijana nata mangaLE mantriNI daNDinI samUhAdi mangaLE
    caraNam 2  			(rAga: madhyamAvati)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S hayagrIva kumbhajAdi pUjita nitya mangaLE niratishaya shubha mangaLE navanava vidha mangaLE
